attributes.action: Abolish the Standing Charges for meters.
attributes.additional_details:
With the cost of both Gas & Electricity about to rise by an average of 50%, we, the people, demand that Government force Gas, Electricity aswell as Water businesses in the UK to abolish the Standing Charges for both meters.


With the country on it's knees and trying to rise again from a pandemic, we, the people feel this is a 'kick in the teeth' to ALL domestic & business costomers.

We, the nation need help from our Government to ease the burden of rising costs and feel this'll be a good start
attributes.background: Stop Gas, Electricity and water businesses from charging it's costomers to have meters.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for utility providers.

You can find out more about standing charges for energy here: https://www.energyhelpline.com/help/what-are-unit-rates-and-standing-charges

And you can find out more about standing charges for water here: https://www.ofwat.gov.uk/households/your-water-bill/metering/
